title: Koogan Cave
content: Koogan Cave is located at the 50km distance of the south-east of Khoram Abad city in Lorestan province This cave has been dug in Ashkanid (Parthian) period by hand into the heart of a mountain and has been people’s living place in different historical periods. This cave is two-storied and consists of a few separate rooms. Being dug at a height and out of reach, this cave is now equipped with a metal stair- case to help the visitors reach the cave. This cave has been put in the list of lran’s national sites; it also has very beautiful and scenic natural surroundings. The eye-catching landscapes can be view from the mouth of the cave. The cave is situated in the Eocene-Oligocene formations.
